website_summaries.verdict: A super-affordable wooden high chair that doesn't have any extras, but will last a long time.
pros: Very sturdy and easy to clean
Just the right height to pull up to the table so baby can eat with everyone else
Identical to most restaurant high chairs
cons: This is a very simple high chair, so there's no padding, no tray, and it's not adjustable

customer_reviews.title: nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: This is a good high chair for a grandparent because it's sturdy and doesn't take up much room. I'm using it for dolls in between visits. It doesn't seem as big as the restaurant high chairs though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good No-Frills High Chair/Toddler Climbing Frame
customer_reviews.text: This generic-looking high chair/toddler climbing frame is probably the same wooden unit you've seen in nearly every restaurant in the country. They're solid, cheap to replace and simple to put together. If it can survive half of the town's babies and toddlers, it can probably survive your kiddo at home. Don't get me wrong-- it's no-frills. It's just the wooden structure- no padding, no cushion, but it's pretty a pretty good buy. My kiddo doesn't so much sit on it as use it as a climbing frame or ladder to reach counter tops, but I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Splashy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these chairs I have purchased. They go together easily, especially with the help of a second person. Good workmanship. I would have given this a 5 star rating but this second chair was missing the caps to go over the screws. Of course we did not notice this until it was together, including the glue. I am not going to take it apart to resend. I hope to be able to get the caps from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-made, with beautiful finishes.
customer_reviews.text: We love these high chairs for our grandchildren to use when visiting. They have been used by 22 month, 14 month-olds, and will soon be used by a 7 month old. The little ones love to actually eat at the table with everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean, seat belt safety questionable.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for transitioning your toddler from a standard high chair with tray to a "big kid" chair to eat at the table with family. Wood quality seems sturdy. Only complaint is the safety belt/strap. My toddler was able to pull her legs out and swing them around to the side of the chair because it only straps around the front, making it easy to slide out of the restraint belt.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my grandson. Prefer this over hunky plastic ones! Tucks under my table nicely. Safety clip is a little tough to release, will probably improve with use. I put it together myself, except for one bolt that was not quite lined up well with the pre-drilled holes. Sturdy. I didn't rate comfort, as it's wooden seat....I didn't buy it for the comfort, I bought it for the practicality. 5 stars for practical and value.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is nice and heavy my granddaughter likes to try to climb in it herself and it’s heavy so while I help her I don’t worry about it tipping over. It’s very easy to clean and fits nicely under my table
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Wooden High Chair
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a high chair for grandchildren when they come to visit. This was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I am planning to order another one and they will stack as not to take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I placed a sticker on the bottom to remind me of when I tightened the screws last. It does not gave a tray attached. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Still have it 7 years later. Used it for my 2 kids and now for guests. I keep it stored in a closet for guests. Just like a restaurant seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Panda

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for all!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect high chair for our 21 month grandson as he transitions from a baby high chair to the family dinner table. Love it! The natural chair is a great match with our light oak table and oak floors - looks great in our kitchen and is comfortable and good fit for our grandson who will need a thin seat pillow for a few weeks until he is at the table-level best for him. Will order another for our grandson at his home.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Easy to assemble, Responsive seller!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easy to assemble. Was missing one of the pieces that go between the legs, but contacted the seller and they sent the piece out asap.
customer_reviews.author: formula5

customer_reviews.title: like them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They look so nice at our table and they were super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wooden high chair
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these chairs; one for each grandchild who visits on a regular basis. One child is 3 and we got the chair when she was a year old. The other child is 8 months old and he sits in his while being fed. I love these chairs and would highly recommend them. They wipe off easily, have safety belts, are a nice height for our dining table, and they look nice. We set them under our breakfast bar when not being used. I purchased these chairs at Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: kajo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: Nice highchair. We use it alternately for a three year-old and a 9 month-old. It's just like the chairs in restaurants, and it's easy to clean, except the straps can't be removed for washing. You can't leave a baby unattended because they can easily escape the lap belt. Our toddler can safely climb in and out herself.
customer_reviews.author: anon.

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Looks nice. Just the right height for granddaughter to eat at the table with us.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Philbrook

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and meets our needs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and meets our needs. We bought to use in our church. They are sturdy and pretty stable. For the very active 2 year olds you still need to keep a close eye out as they try to climb out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chair for my 7-month old grandson! He loves to sit at the table with everyone else. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: good compact size just like the ones in the restaurants ...
customer_reviews.text: good compact size just like the ones in the restaurants but the strap came defective (the plastic where the straps adjust was broken)
customer_reviews.author: Niche17

customer_reviews.title: chair review
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of this chair. Works great for my grandchildren and can stack when they are not around.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Heinrichs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use at our house when our grandson visits. It was just as described and even nicer. The wood was really smooth; it went together easily and our kids were really impressed with the quality. Would definitely recommend over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O

customer_reviews.title: Great quality seat
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to assemble. Love that it has a footrest for extra kiddo comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Best buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect highchair! Easy to put together. Easy to clean. High quality. Simple to sit my daughter in and push up to the table. And I like that she is level with all of us during dinner.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and wipe clean very easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for use in our church fellowship hall and they are so popular had to buy 2 more. Very sturdy and wipe clean very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, great price. Easy to assemble. Looks like it will last a long time. Our daughter enjoys sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lights

customer_reviews.title: Great buy at a low price
customer_reviews.text: I was ecstatic at how sturdy and high quality this chair is! Easy to assemble also. Could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: only negative I have is that my 21 month old ...
customer_reviews.text: only negative I have is that my 21 month old can get out of it even when he is buckled.
customer_reviews.author: gisela

customer_reviews.title: ... past the posted delivery date for order to be satisfied. Responses by the online order staff were very ...
customer_reviews.text: Took 12 days past the posted delivery date for order to be satisfied. Responses by the online order staff were very vague and became unresponsive in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WRONG ITEM SENT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a high hair. The box says high hair but inside the box is a smaller box with 2 cutting boards. No highchair! Very upset ! Needed highchair for this Thursday when my granddaughter comes to visit!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: There was an important part missing. We contacted the manufacturer who told us to contact Amazon who contacted JB Tools. JB tools told us to contact the manufacturer! They did offer to refund our money, but we wanted the missing part. I replied to JB Tools explaining what had happened had happened. I was rudely scolded for not giving them all the details (I wasn't the one who contacted them.) and was rudely told they had given me the another option (Return the chair.) Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, easy assembly and coordinate with our table
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, easy assembly and coordinate with our table. Our grandson loved it. (The dog, too for the scraps on the floor!). It had a musty smell initially, I assume from storage , but the odor dissipated over time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, super easy to clean high chair
customer_reviews.text: This high chair has ZERO nooks and crannies for old food to get stuck. No fabric cover to take off and wash either because the only fabric on it is the straps. It's perfect. Super easy to clean, even if you don't particularly like to clean. It is the perfect height to pull the kiddo right up to the table so they can have dinner with the family. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Kari O.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product for the money. This exact style turns up at every restaurant you go to, so it must be OK. I got the walnut and the natural and they are holding up fine with a one year old active baby boy. He can climb out but that's OK. because table manners come slowly. It assembled easily in 20 minutes and all of the required tools were supplied.
customer_reviews.author: HankMan

customer_reviews.title: missing part
customer_reviews.text: missing one horizontal strut. But this high chair is what I wanted for the grandchildren. it can be turned upside down and used with a baby carrier. But with the missing piece it won't work for that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Mascolo

customer_reviews.title: Need wood glue to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love this style of high chair. It would have been immensely helpful however if it had said somewhere that wood glue is needed and not included. 😠 Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda  L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, sturdy, easy to clean, and stackable. Bought two for my grandsons for use around our family dining table. Worked very well for both the two year old and 9 month old. We put a nonskid Hippo-Grippo pad in it for the 9 month old as an extra safety measure so he wouldn't slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Wooden high chair
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a little slow for my older parent, but the chair is great quality and light, for easy movement. Super quick clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lingo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect high chair for my Grandparent kitchen. Love that the grandchildren are actually at the table with us, not off to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Eaglelake

customer_reviews.title: Love This Chair
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. Bought one for first grandchild 4 years ago and it has worked beautifully when having her at the table. Now I have a new grear grandbabby coming so I bought one for her grandmother, my daughter :)
customer_reviews.author: aloha me

customer_reviews.title: love the chair
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy this chair because Addie can sit right at the table with us instead of being slightly removed like other highchairs. They work in restaurants for a reason. Plus the finish matches our table nearly perfectly. The only complaint is that the straps come from the side instead of the back.
customer_reviews.author: AddiesMomma

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, comes with the necessary allen wrench. Quite sturdy once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s not as bulky as a high chair.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wehby

customer_reviews.title: Five stars except shipment was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I would have given five stars but the company sent a blond and brown chair even though we ordered and expected two brown chairs. We kept them anyway since we had twin grandkids so it worked for us. They were easy to assemble and looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Was really no good instructions to put it together. WE guessed but it was not hard.
customer_reviews.author: keri Banister

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and easy to assemble. Exactly what we were looking for to put in our restaurant!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Angerstein

customer_reviews.title: Mostly OK - Grandson likes it
customer_reviews.text: The high chair went together OK except for one bolt, it was bent and took a bit to get it to work without stripping it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Wayland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together, but you do need 2 people. grandchild loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little chair
customer_reviews.text: The strap is a little short, otherwise it is great! It is pretty open, and without the strap it is not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tremont

customer_reviews.title: says high hair but inside the box is a smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: says high hair but inside the box is a smaller box with 2 cutting boards. No highchair! Very upset !
customer_reviews.author: TIANYAN XU

product_meta.title: Winco Unassembled Wooden High Chair, Natural
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Winco has been a trusted and reliable brand in professional kitchens for over 20 years. Our commercial lines of products, ranging from tabletop to kitchen utensils to food preparation supplies, are used by all foodservice and hospitality industry experts worldwide. While our products are made to meet the high demands of a restaurant kitchen, we are excited to now make them available for the serious home chef.
feature_bullets: Winco products range from tabletop to kitchen utensils to food preparation supplies
Winco products are used by all foodservice and hospitality industry experts worldwide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
